meanings.definition: A type of leg of lamb or mutton.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared delicious gigots for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The butcher recommended the gigots for the Sunday roast.
meanings.sent3: The gigots were so flavorful, they danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The gigots on the plate resembled two elegant pillars of meat.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the roasting gigots filled the entire kitchen.

meanings.definition: A style of sleeve that is puffed at the shoulder and fitted from the elbow to the wrist.
meanings.sent1: Her dress had beautiful gigots that added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer showcased a collection featuring gigots on the sleeves.
meanings.sent3: The gigots on the blouse made her arms look like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a princess in the dress with gigots that resembled blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The gigots on the sleeves gave her outfit a unique and stylish flair.
